languages.text: {n}По воксу раздается сухой голос Иокасты Зауэрбэк.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мы нашли ублюдка. В обычной ситуации он был бы уже казнен, а я бы рапортовала о завершении расследования, но, кажется, его исповедь может вас заинтересовать. Вам лучше услышать ее лично — я буду ждать в штабе на офицерской палубе".

{n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."
languages.original_text: {n}По воксу раздается сухой голос Иокасты Зауэрбэк.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мы нашли ублюдка. В обычной ситуации он был бы уже казнен, а я бы рапортовала о завершении расследования, но, кажется, его исповедь может вас заинтересовать. Вам лучше услышать ее лично — я буду ждать в штабе на офицерской палубе".

languages.text: {n}Oyes la voz seca de Jocasta Sauerback desde el voco:{/n} «Lord Capitán, hemos atrapado al bellaco. En circunstancias normales, ya estaría ejecutado e informaría del fin de la investigación, pero creo que su confesión puede resultarle interesante. Lo mejor será que lo oiga de boca del mismo culpable. L{mf|e|a} esperaré en el cuartel de investigación de la cubierta de oficiales».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."

En circunstancias normales, ya estaría ejecutado e informaría del fin de la investigación, pero creo que su confesión puede resultarle interesante. Lo mejor será que lo oiga de boca del mismo culpable. L{mf|e|a} esperaré en el cuartel de investigación de la cubierta de oficiales».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス越しに、ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックの乾いた声が聞こえる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、異端者を捕らえました。普通であればすでに処刑して、調査終了の報告していたところですが、この男の告白はあなたの聞くべきことかもしれません。犯人から直接、話を聞くのが一番です…士官デッキの調査本部へのご到着をお待ちしています」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス越しに、ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックの乾いた声が聞こえる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、異端者を捕らえました。普通であればすでに処刑して、調査終了の報告していたところですが、この男の告白はあなたの聞くべきことかもしれません。犯人から直接、話を聞くのが一番です…士官デッキの調査本部へのご到着をお待ちしています」

languages.text: {n}你听到通讯器里传来了约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克毫无感情的声音。{/n}“舰长大人，我们已经抓住了罪魁祸首。如果是通常情况下，我早就把他处决了，把相关的调查报告结果整理给您。但我认为，您可能会对他的供词感兴趣，最好还是让这个犯人对您亲口坦白吧。我会在军官甲板的调查办公室里等着您。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到通讯器里传来了约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克毫无感情的声音。{/n}“舰长大人，我们已经抓住了罪魁祸首。如果是通常情况下，我早就把他处决了，把相关的调查报告结果整理给您。但我认为，您可能会对他的供词感兴趣，最好还是让这个犯人对您亲口坦白吧。我会在军官甲板的调查办公室里等着您。”

languages.text: {n}Du hörst die trockene Stimme von Jocasta Sauerback über das Vox-System:{/n} "Lord Captain, wir haben den Schurken gefunden. Unter normalen Umständen wäre er bereits hingerichtet worden und ich würde vom Abschluss der Ermittlungen berichten, doch ich glaube, sein Geständnis könnte Euch interessieren. Ihr solltet selbst mit dem Täter sprechen. Ich erwarte Eure Ankunft im Ermittlungshauptquartier auf dem Offiziersdeck."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst die trockene Stimme von Jocasta Sauerback über das Vox-System:{/n} "Lord Captain, wir haben den Schurken gefunden. Unter normalen Umständen wäre er bereits hingerichtet worden und ich würde vom Abschluss der Ermittlungen berichten, doch ich glaube, sein Geständnis könnte Euch interessieren. Ihr solltet selbst mit dem Täter sprechen. Ich erwarte Eure Ankunft im Ermittlungshauptquartier auf dem Offiziersdeck."

languages.text: {n}La voix de Jocasta Sauerback se fait entendre à travers le vox :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons attrapé le mécréant. Dans d'autres circonstances, je l'aurais déjà fait exécuter et je vous ferais mon rapport sur les conclusions de l'enquête, mais j'ai pensé que ses aveux pourraient vous intéresser. Il est préférable que vous les entendiez de sa bouche. J'attendrai que vous nous rejoigniez au quartier général de l'enquête, sur le pont des officiers. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Jocasta Sauerback se fait entendre à travers le vox :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons attrapé le mécréant. Dans d'autres circonstances, je l'aurais déjà fait exécuter et je vous ferais mon rapport sur les conclusions de l'enquête, mais j'ai pensé que ses aveux pourraient vous intéresser. Il est préférable que vous les entendiez de sa bouche. J'attendrai que vous nous rejoigniez au quartier général de l'enquête, sur le pont des officiers. »

languages.text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback'in vokstan yayılan duygusuz sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, o vicdansızı yakaladık. Normal şartlarda çoktan infaz edilmişti, ben de şu anda sorgunun nasıl sona erdiğini raporluyordum ancak itirafının ilginizi çekeceğine inanıyorum. Bunu suçlunun ağzından dinlemeniz daha iyi olur. Subay güvertesindeki sorgu karargâhında gelmenizi bekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the dry voice of Jocasta Sauerback over the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, we've caught the miscreant. Under normal circumstances, he would already have been executed and I would have been reporting about the end of the investigation, but I believe his confession may be of interest to you. It's best that you hear from the culprit himself — I will await your arrival at the investigation headquarters on the officers' deck."
